mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM T_HOTEL_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND HOTEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND HOTEL_ADDRES LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.hotelAddres,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY HOTEL_NAME ASC
